question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. laptop
B. remote control
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The remote control is on a patterned surface in the lower-left, while the laptop is on a wooden tray closer to the viewer; their relative positions in the image make depth judgment ambiguous without a depth map.
